Package com.sebastienguillemin.wswrl.engine

Class DefaultWSWRLRuleEngine

java.lang.Object
com.sebastienguillemin.wswrl.engine.DefaultSWRLRuleEngine
com.sebastienguillemin.wswrl.engine.DefaultWSWRLRuleEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
WSWRLRuleEngine, org.swrlapi.core.SWRLRuleEngine
public class DefaultWSWRLRuleEngine extends DefaultSWRLRuleEngine implements WSWRLRuleEngine
This class provides an implementation of some of the core functionality required by a SWRL rule engine.
This implementation is taken from the SWRLAPI.
